title: Define System Requirements
description:
Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the DistributedTracingAnalyzer system. The requirements should cover the following aspects:

1. Data ingestion: Specify the expected format, volume, and velocity of the distributed tracing data.
2. Data processing: Define the required processing steps, such as data cleaning, normalization, and enrichment.
3. Analysis: Identify the types of performance bottlenecks and security issues to be detected, and the analysis techniques to be employed.
4. Reporting and visualization: Specify the desired output formats (e.g., dashboards, reports) and the level of detail required.
5. Scalability and performance: Define the expected load and performance requirements, including response times and throughput.
6. Security and compliance: Outline any relevant security and compliance requirements, such as data encryption, access controls, and audit logging.
7. Integration: Identify any external systems or services that need to be integrated with the DistributedTracingAnalyzer.
8. Operational requirements: Specify the deployment, monitoring, and maintenance needs of the system.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the DistributedTracingAnalyzer system, including components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Implement Data Ingestion
description: Develop the component responsible for ingesting distributed tracing data from various sources.

title: Implement Data Processing
description: Develop the component responsible for processing and analyzing the ingested tracing data.

title: Implement Data Storage
description: Design and implement the data storage solution for the analyzed tracing data.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for visualizing and interacting with the analyzed tracing data.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Identify and implement security measures to protect the system and data from potential threats.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Establish a Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for automated testing and deployment.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, including installation, configuration, and usage guides.

title: Perform System Testing
description: Develop and execute test plans to ensure the system meets the defined requirements and functions as expected.
